title.rendered: Top Rated Tattoo Studio of Ahmedabad with Premium Tattooing Experience

content.rendered:
Where
Ahmedabad
Gets Inked!

Black Poison Tattoos is Gujarat’s renowned Tattoo Shop. We have already done more than 1,00,000 + Quality Tattoos. If you are looking to get inked try our Free consultation and we will try our best to finalize your tattoo design concept.

free consultation
our portfolio
About Us

Best Tattoo Shop in Ahmedabad with 1,00,000 + Quality Tattoos & over 15 Years of Experience!

Best Tattoo Studio in Ahmedabad

A professional Team of 10+ experienced Tattoo Artists with a combined experience of 30 Years.

If you want to wear an amazing custom tattoo then you don’t need to think about the tattoo design concept or quality of the tattoo at Black Poison Tattoos. Just book a Free Consultation and visit ahmedabad’s best tattoo studio and leave everything else on us.

Free Consultation

Our Portfolio

These are some of our Latest Tattoos

show all

Power of Lord Shiva Tattoo with Mahamrityunjay Mantra

Exploring the Deep Symbolism of Lord Buddha and Warrior Tattoos

Polynesian Armband Tattoo

Maa Paa Tattoo

Pocket Watch Tattoo with Name & Birth Date on Shoulder: Timeless and Meaningful Ink

Beautiful Dog Tattoo: Honoring Your Furry Friend with Ink

Wings Tattoo on Back

Custom Tattoo Designs

Our Tattoo Artists are talented enough to covert your thoughts in a beautiful design.

Cover Up Tattoos

Want to get rid of an ugly tattoo? Our Cover Up Tattoo will cover that Tattoo nicely.

Piercing

Our artists are also very experienced in piercing and we have a variety of accessories.

What Our Customers Say About Our Services

SONAL BAROT
The artists are incredibly talented and attentive to detail, ensuring that each piece is a unique work of art. The studio is immaculately clean and maintains the highest standards of hygiene. The staff is friendly and pr...
ofessional, making you feel comfortable and at ease. I highly recommend Studio for anyone looking to get a high-quality tattoo.
Show More
Posted On Google
2 weeks ago
Neel Shah
I recently got a tattoo, and I couldn't be happier with the outcome! The Jack did an amazing job capturing exactly what I wanted, and their dedication to their craft was evident throughout the entire process. The time sp...
ent in the studio was enjoyable, and the positive atmosphere added to the overall experience. I highly recommend this Black Poison to anyone looking for quality work and a welcoming environment. Can't wait to come back for my next tattoo!
Show More
Posted On Google
3 weeks ago
Jayson Chavda
Amazing place! Have been a customer here since 4-5 years now! Started my tattoo journey with black poison and now I don’t think I can trust anyone else with the ink😂🥰! Had amazing experience with Nevil for my lat...
est sitting, he has got the knowledge and artistry! Hope you get inked here only as I do!!!!
Show More
Posted On Google
a month ago
Jainy Patel
I recently got a tattoo at Black Poison, and I couldn't be happier with the experience! From the moment I walked in, I was impressed by the studio's cleanliness and professional atmosphere. The artists are incredibly tal...
ented and took the time to understand my vision, offering valuable insights and suggestions to perfect my design. The attention to detail and commitment to quality were evident in every aspect of their work. The staff were friendly, and accommodating, and made sure I was comfortable throughout the entire process. My tattoo turned out even better than I imagined! I highly recommend Black Poison to anyone looking for top-notch artistry and a memorable tattoo experience. 5 stars all the way!
Show More
Posted On Google
3 weeks ago
Manthan Amrutiya
Good start to a Tat’ for the first time! Would surely recommend this place to anyone. Well assisted from the foremost point of designing to getting imprinted. The atmosphere of shop is soothing. Their work ethics are a...
lso above par. I visited it a while back with my friend. She wanted to get a tattoo done in memory of her pet and well it turned out to be the best memoir/memento ever for her! Can’t even fathom till day how good the tattoo looked. Pricing is a tad-bit high but for the level of professionalism, it was worth it. Loved their inclination towards maintaining asepsis. Last but not least, their handy-work is just too fantastic!
Show More
Posted On Google
a week ago
T Breezy
Best tattoo shop in Ahmedabad. The artists are extremely talented and professional, and do everything they can to ensure your tattoo is absolutely perfect. Prices are very reasonable and the staff are very helpful and su...
pportive. Will always come back to this place, recommend to everyone.
Show More
Posted On Google
a month ago
Riya Rawal
Nevil sir curated a very appealing art of a butterfly. Sir helped me with the designing of it all .Staff was warm and welcoming. Great atmosphere of studio. Very good artist, knows his work , 10/10 would recommend!
Posted On Google
2 months ago
Soni Shubham
I recently got my first tattoo at Black Poison Tattoo, and I couldn't be happier with the experience. From the moment I walked in, I knew I had made the right choice. The studio itself is clean and inviting, with a profe...
ssional atmosphere that immediately puts you at ease. I must give a special shout-out to the talented artist who worked on my tattoo. Although I can't recall his name, (Sardarji) His skills are truly impressive, and he did a phenomenal job. His attention to detail and precision are evident in every line and shade of my tattoo. It's clear that he is passionate about his craft and takes great pride in his work One of the aspects that stood out to me was the studio's commitment to hygiene and safety. They took every precaution to ensure that the tattooing process was sterile and that there was no risk of infection. This level of care and professionalism is incredibly reassuring, especially for someone getting their first tattoo The tattoo itself is more than just ink on my skin; it's a piece of art that is deeply connected to me. Black Poison Tattoo and their amazing team have made this experience memorable and special. I highly recommend this studio to anyone considering a tattoo. If you're looking for exceptional artistry and a team that genuinely cares about their clients, look no further than Black Poison Tattoo Believe me, you won't be disappointed. If you want a tattoo that you'll be proud of, make sure to visit this outstanding studio
Show More
Posted On Google
in the last week
Radha Ratanpara
Nevil is such a talented artist. He listened what we wanted and advised us on what would look good on our bodies. He made me feel super comfortable and the vibe of the shop is so awesome. The shop is clean, sanitized, an...
d spacious. If you are thinking of getting a tattoo, Black poison is the place. Ask for Nevil !!!!
Show More
Posted On Google
in the last week
Jainam Mota
I had an incredible experience at Black Tattoo Shop. I got an arm band tattoo with a custom design related to my craziest thing with speeding with cars and racing that reflects my personal ideology. The staff was extreme...
ly helpful, guiding me through the process to bring my vision to life. The attention to detail and the care they took in ensuring I was happy with the design was impressive. Highly recommend this shop for anyone looking to create something unique and meaningful! Staff was all kind hearted and generous.
Show More
Posted On Google
in the last week
Sheryn Mehta
Great studio atmosphere! The hygiene at the studio is also amazing. I was also very happy with my artist, Nevil’s, work!! He made sure multiple times that the tattoo was exactly what I wanted. He even changed gloves mu...
ltiple times based on touch ups, keeping hygiene in mind. I got an outline of a photo, and I am super happy with how it has turned out! I won’t even consider another tattoo studio in Ahmedabad except Black Poison.
Show More
Posted On Google
in the last week
Kummar Bhavesh
I had an incredible experience with Black Poison Tattoos at Black Poison Tattoos! From start to finish, everything was top-notch. The studio itself was clean, welcoming, and had a great vibe. Black Poison Tattoos is not...
only a master of their craft but also incredibly professional and friendly. They took the time to understand exactly what I wanted, offered valuable suggestions, and made sure I was comfortable throughout the process. The tattoo I received is absolutely stunning—better than I had imagined. Their attention to detail and artistic skills are truly impressive. The healing process was smooth, and the final result looks even more amazing than I hoped. If you’re looking for a talented and reliable tattoo artist, I highly recommend Black Poison Tattoos atBlack Poison Tattoos. I’ll definitely be coming back for my next tattoo!
Show More
Posted On Google
in the last week
Mayuri Dharodia
“I had an amazing experience at Black Poison Tattoo Studio! The artist - Devang was incredibly talented and professional. They took the time to understand exactly what I wanted and executed it perfectly. The studio its...
elf was clean and comfortable, which made the whole process even better. I’m thrilled with my tattoo and would highly recommend Black Poison to anyone looking for a high-quality tattoo experience.” Thank you so much Black Poision Tattoo studio..!! You guys made my day..!! 😍
Show More
Posted On Google
4 months ago
Anand Joshi
It was an amazing experience. My appointment is in afternoon, it’s so quiet and peaceful there. The music is bit loud but its ohk. The artists are good and they provide all kind of piercing as well
Posted On Google
in the last week
Anupam Deori
Absolutely thrilled with my experience at the Black Poison Tattoos. The ambiance and overall atmosphere was welcoming and professional. The studio is impeccably clean and the staff is incredibly skilled, knowledgeable, a...
nd above all, friendly and approachable (right from the housekeeping staff to the owner). They also maintained a high standard of hygiene throughout the process, which was greatly reassuring. My tattoo being a massive cover-up, I had to sit for 4 separate sessions of 10-11 hours each to get it done. However, they made me feel like I’m sitting in my own living room and took care of all my needs. My tattoo artist (Jack, who’s also the co-owner) took the time to understand my vision with patience, offered valuable inputs, and after a few iterations came up with a design beyond my expectation. Not only is he extremely talented but also the attention to detail and precision in his work is truly impressive. He has 15+ years of experience and executed the design flawlessly from the design board to the skin. After every session tattoo-aftercare instructions were diligently given and followed up with checking on the tattoo healing process by Jack personally. Some might say the place is expensive, but then Quality comes with a premium, right? Overall, Black Poison Tattoos provides an exceptional tattoo experience, and I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for top-notch artistry and excellent customer service. I’m definitely planning to go back for some more work done eventually.
Show More
Posted On Google
in the last week
Kiah Goyal
Had the best experience of getting a tattoo! Jay was absolutely amazing; he was extremely patient during consultation and even while doing the tattoo, i was at most comfort. Extremely skilled- I felt no pain at all given...
it was my first tattoo as well! Super super happy with the result and experience. Definitely recommend!
Show More
Posted On Google
in the last week
Manasavi Gupta
I had an incredible experience. From the moment I walked into the studio, the atmosphere was welcoming and professional. They took the time to understand exactly what I wanted, offering valuable insights and suggestions ...
that made the design even better than I had imagined. The attention to detail during the tattooing process was remarkable, and I could tell they take great pride in their work. The result was stunning. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for exceptional craftsmanship and a positive experience!
Show More
Posted On Google
in the last week
om kanada
I recently got a tattoo at black poison tattoo studio , and I couldn’t be happier with the experience! The studio is clean, modern, and has a great vibe. The staff is incredibly friendly and professional, making me fee...
l comfortable from the moment I walked in. My artist, Mayank was fantastic. They took the time to understand my vision and worked with me to design the perfect tattoo. The attention to detail and skill in the execution were top-notch. The entire process was smooth, and I felt well taken care of throughout. I’m thrilled with my new tattoo—it looks amazing and is healing beautifully. I highly recommend black poison tattoo studio to anyone looking for high-quality tattoo work in a welcoming environment. I’ll definitely be back for my next piece!
Show More
